  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Update
    Update interface provides methods Performs update repository configuration.
    UpdateTypes
    Defines the data types of the Update API service.

    Defines the type descriptors for the top-level types in com.vmware.appliance.techpreview.system package.

    Defines the type descriptors for the Update API service.

    Remote stub implementation of the Update API service.
    UpdateTypes.AutoUpdateNotification
    AutoUpdateNotification enumeration class Defines state for automatic update notification

    UpdateDay enumeration class Defines days to query for updates

    UpdateStructSet class Structure to set url update repository.
